0.name: Whack a tako
description: Bonk the takos to gain points before the timer runs out! But avoid bonking the ikas, or you'll loose points.
Bonk AO-chan to get more time!
controls: [table=2] [cell]Left mouse button: [/cell][cell] Bonk[/cell] [cell]Move mouse: [/cell][cell] Control hammer[/cell] [/table]
